Hungry?
We got you fam.
McDonalds's has been serving to happy customers since 1940. We specialize in burgers. We use only a hundred percent pure beef with no additives, preservatives or flavor enhancers. Our vegetables are also natural and sourced from the cold mountains of Bukidnon and Baguio. Our buns are baked locally and delivered fresh regularly to guarantee taste and freshness.
